sentences.sContent: GR99027 meteorite from Blue Ice Area in Antarctica is an achondrite.
sentences.sContent_eng: GR99027 meteorite from Blue Ice Area in Antarctica is an achondrite.
sentences.sCn: 来自南极格罗夫山蓝冰地区的GR99027陨石为一无球粒陨石。

trans.tranOther: a rare stony meteorite that consists mainly of silicate minerals and has the texture of igneous rock but contains no chondrules
